description.en: Energoncoin is a Token ERC20 of Ethereum technology, our token is developed for a platform of exchange of collectible objects like Robots, Transformers, Action Toys, our platform will soon be available all over the world so you can buy, sell or auction By paying for your products with Energoncoin, this will help you regardless of the currency of your country and the exchange value, since the pair of (Energoncoin with Bitcoin) TFG1 / BTC is worldwide, regardless of which part of the world you are your tokens will have a universal value, something interesting in this project is that there are only 10 million Tokens, so their limited quantity will make their value more interesting.
